summary: A small adventure mod with a theme kinda like the amazing race with 250.000 septims up for grabs, dont think it will be easy though, you will have to work your puzzle solving mind to get those septims.
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/t1.0-9/10294373_10152402941704189_6137391144572516402_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
NOTE: CONTAINS CRUDE HUMOR AND ADULT LANGUAGE.

A small adventure mod with a theme kinda like the amazing race with 250.000 septims up for grabs, dont think it will be easy though, you will have to work your puzzle solving mind to get those septims.

You first read a note in "The Banneredmere" in "Whiterun" and then a riddle will lead you to another note and so on until you have found the 10th note with the grand prize.

There is no waypoints or quest popups etc, you will just have to read the riddles and try find it all by yourself.

Hope you enjoy this small little adventure.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-a-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10270824_10152402965709189_6646931807125246817_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Use NMM to install or if your doing it manually then just copy the file downloaded here and place it in your skyrim data folder.
[line]
[img]https://scontent-b-sjc.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-prn2/t1.0-9/10291794_10152402965374189_2040155054134122673_n.jpg[/img]
[line]
Just deactivate in NMM or delete the "Rhys The Riddler.esp".
[line][/center]
author: HarrisModifications
